description.en: This Pokémon spends most of its time hiding in the mud.
description.ja: このポケモンは、ほとんどの時間を泥の中に隠れて過ごしています。

effect.en: Lets out a low growl at the opponent. It's meant to intimidate them, but it's pretty cute.
effect.ja: 相手に向かってうなり声を出す。恐怖を与えるためのものだが、なかなかかわいい。

effect.en: Spits water at the opponent.
effect.ja: 相手に水を吐きかける。

description.en: Possesses powerful psychic abilities, but they only come into play when having a chronic headache.
description.ja: 強力な超能力を持っているが、慢性的な頭痛に襲われたときだけ発揮される。

effect.en: Forget everything that is happening right now. This somehow increases special defense. Editor's note: I do this all the time, but my special defense never goes up.
effect.ja: 今起きていることをすべて忘れてしまう。これにより、なぜか特防が上がる。私はいつもこれをやっていますが、特防が上がることはありません。

description.en: This Pokémon was born under a large mountain. It takes years to eat up all of its food, and after it does, it takes a long nap.
description.ja: 大きな山の下で生まれたポケモン。何年もかけて食べ尽くし、食べ尽くした後は長い昼寝をする。

effect.en: Picks up a rock and throws it at the opponent. A technique often used in high school.
effect.ja: 岩石を拾って相手に投げつける。高校時代によく使われた技だ。

description.en: The frequency of the singing voice perfectly matches the brain waves of a person in deep sleep.
description.ja: 歌声の波動は、深い眠りの人の脳波と完全に一致する。

effect.en: It sings a variety of songs that are popular among young people today.
effect.ja: 今、若者に人気のある様々な歌を歌う。

effect.en: Slaps the opponent with its small pink hands.
effect.ja: ピンクの小さな手で相手をひっぱたく。

description.en: The shell becomes as hard as iron.
description.ja: 甲羅が鉄のように硬くなる。

effect.en: Becomes hard.
effect.ja: 硬くなる。

description.en: It can levitate thanks to the magnetic field generated within its body.
description.ja: 体内で磁場を発生させるため、浮遊することができる。

effect.en: An attack that paralyzes the target with a wave of electricity.
effect.ja: 電気の波動で対象を麻痺させる攻撃。

description.en: Items can be recharged when placed on the head.
description.ja: 頭に乗せると充電できる。

effect.en: Uses electricity to power up its punch and strike the enemy. Because its arms are small, this attack often misses.
effect.ja: 電気でパンチをパワーアップさせ、敵を殴る。腕が小さいので、この攻撃はよく外れる。

description.en: This Pokémon is a big foodie. It only eats French fries and Hot Pockets.
description.ja: このポケモンは、とても食いしん坊です。フライドポテトとホットポケットしか食べません。

effect.en: Scratches the opponent with its long clawed fingers.
effect.ja: 長い爪の指で相手を引っ掻く。

effect.en: A terrifying attack that slowly sucks the life from the opponent, eventually leaving them a corpse.
effect.ja: 相手の命を少しずつ吸い取り、最後は死体になってしまう恐ろしい攻撃。

description.en: This Pokémon is born with a seed on its back. They grow at the same rate and eventually become part of the body.
description.ja: このポケモンは、背中に種を背負って生まれてくる。同じ速度で成長し、やがて体の一部となる。

effect.en: A terrifying attack that slowly sucks the life out of the opponent, eventually leaving them as a corpse.
effect.ja: 相手の命を少しずつ吸い取り、最後は死体になってしまう恐ろしい攻撃。

description.en: When it's dangerous, it stays in the shell.
description.ja: 危険なときは殻に閉じこもる。

effect.en: Likes to blow bubbles. So cute!
effect.ja: 泡を吹くのが好き。なかなかかわいい。

effect.en: Spins in a circle. Also very cute.
effect.ja: 円を描くように回転する。これもとてもかわいい。

description.en: If the flame goes out, it dies.
description.ja: 炎が消えると死んでしまう。

effect.en: Stare at the opponent with contempt.
effect.ja: 相手を軽蔑したような目で見る。

effect.en: Weak fire attack.
effect.ja: 弱火攻撃。

description.en: This Pokémon spends its time eating leaves and running away from Starly.
description.ja: 葉っぱを食べたり、スターリーから逃げたりして過ごすポケモン。

effect.en: Shoots silk threads around the opponent, lowering their speed.
effect.ja: 絹でできた糸を相手の周囲に発射し、相手の素早さを下げる。

description.en: This Pokémon is very rare. When encountered, it quickly runs away.
description.ja: このポケモンは非常にレアです。遭遇しても逃げ足が速い。

effect.en: Lay and eat boiled eggs. To be honest, it's very unpleasant.
effect.ja: 卵を産んで食べます。正直なところ、非常に不愉快である。

description.en: Its claws can crush anything.
description.ja: その爪は、どんなものでも砕くことができる。

effect.en: Dance with swords. Do not use at home.
effect.ja: 剣を使ってダンスをします。自宅では使わないでください。

effect.en: Attacks the opponent with its head.
effect.ja: 自分の頭で相手を攻撃する。

description.en: A Pokémon that spends all day collecting nectar from flowers.
description.ja: 一日中、花の蜜を集めているポケモン。

effect.en: Causes a poison status on the opponent.
effect.ja: 相手を毒状態にする。

effect.en: Makes the opponent faint.
effect.ja: 相手を気絶させる。

description.en: A common bird Pokémon. It dislikes conflict and often runs away from battle.
description.ja: 一般的な鳥ポケモン。争いを好まず、戦闘から逃げることが多い。

effect.en: Kicks sand into the opponent's eyes and runs away. A truly cowardly move.
effect.ja: 砂を相手の目に蹴りつけて逃走する。まさに卑怯な技。

description.en: This Pokémon has a very strong jaw.
description.ja: 非常に強い顎を持つポケモンです。

effect.en: Bites the opponent.
effect.ja: 相手に噛みつく。

effect.en: Takes out the water gun you bought at the toy store and sprays the opponent.
effect.ja: おもちゃ屋で買った水鉄砲を取り出し、相手に浴びせかける。

description.en: It has a flame inside that never goes out.
description.ja: 体内に炎を宿しており、決して消えることはない。

effect.en: An extremely powerful flame attack. Only the most powerful and experienced Pokémon can pull off this move.
effect.ja: 非常に強力な火炎放射攻撃。経験豊富な最強のポケモンのみが繰り出すことができる技。

description.en: A Pokémon made mostly of gas.
description.ja: ほとんどが気体でできているポケモン。

effect.en: Licks the opponent. Some Pokémon enjoy this, so be careful.
effect.ja: 相手をなめる。中にはこれを喜ぶポケモンもいるので注意。

description.en: Once considered a legendary Pokémon until small colonies were discovered underwater.
description.ja: 水中で小さなコロニーが発見されるまでは、伝説のポケモンとされていたポケモン。

effect.en: Attacks the opponent with its tail.
effect.ja: 尻尾で相手を攻撃する。

effect.en: Stares intently at the opponent.
effect.ja: 相手をじっと見る。

description.en: A Pokémon that emits a mysterious aura. It can change the weather with its emotions.
description.ja: 神秘的なオーラを放つポケモン。感情で天候を変化させることができる。

effect.en: It performs a dance that changes the weather.
effect.ja: 天候を変化させるダンスをする。

effect.en: Charges at the opponent with dragon-like movements.
effect.ja: ドラゴンのような動きで相手に突進する。

description.en: The first Pokémon created by humans. It was born after many years of scientific research and experimentation.
description.ja: 人類が初めて生み出したポケモン。長年の科学の研究・実験の末に誕生したポケモン。

effect.en: It fires a beam made up of multiple elements.
effect.ja: 複数の元素で構成されたビームを放つ。

description.en: This Pokémon can escape from its opponents in a variety of ways.
description.ja: このポケモンは、さまざまな方法で敵から逃げることができる。

effect.en: It creates a cloud of black smoke. This is a technique that the Pokémon learned by observing the ninja.
effect.ja: 黒煙のような雲を発生させる。ポケモンが忍者を観察して覚えた技である。

description.en: A Pokémon that is extremely weak to sunlight. It spends nearly its entire life underground.
description.ja: 日光に非常に弱いポケモン。ほぼ一生を地面の下で過ごす。

effect.en: Digs a hole.
effect.ja: 穴を掘る。

description.en: During the day, it plants itself. At dusk, it wakes up and wanders around scattering seeds.
description.ja: 日中に植物を植え、夕暮れ時に目覚めて歩き回り、種をまき散らすポケモン。

effect.en: Its body grows larger. Who needs protein powder when you’re a plant? Not a bad trick.
effect.ja: 体が大きくなる。プロテインパウダーが必要なのは誰だ？奇抜ではない。

description.en: This Pokémon is born with one tail, which divides into six as it grows up.
description.ja: しっぽが1本で生まれて、大きくなると6本に分かれるポケモン。

effect.en: Attacks the opponent and burns them.
effect.ja: 相手を攻撃し、火傷を負わせる。

effect.en: It's resentful of the person who didn't send a happy birthday email.
effect.ja: 誕生日おめでとうメールを送らなかった相手を恨んでいる。

description.en: A peaceful Pokémon that is happy for you to be carried on its back.
description.ja: 背中に乗せてあげると喜ぶ、平和なポケモン。

effect.en: Skilled at surfing and impresses its friends with its skills.
effect.ja: 波乗りを得意とし、その技で仲間を感動させる。

description.en: If it senses danger it will immediately teleport away.
description.ja: 危険を察知するとすぐにテレポートする。

effect.en: To instantly teleport to another location. Also known as teleportation.
effect.ja: 瞬時に別の場所にテレポートする。瞬間移動とも呼ばれる。

description.en: A fat, lazy, and always hungry Pokémon. It will eat anything, even if it's poisonous.
description.ja: 太っていて、怠け者で、いつもお腹をすかせているポケモン。毒があっても何でも食べてしまう。

effect.en: Falls asleep. Snorlax is good at this move.
effect.ja: 眠りについてしまう。カビゴンはこの技を得意としています。

effect.en: Attacks while asleep.
effect.ja: 眠っている間に攻撃する。

description.en: There are stories of it grabbing young children by the hand and dragging them to the afterlife.
description.ja: 幼い子供の手を掴み、あの世に引きずり込むという話もある。

effect.en: An exploding bomb that can injure yourself or others. Editor's note: I'm afraid the balloon will pop.
effect.ja: ユーザーが爆発し、自分や他人を傷つける。風船が割れるのが怖い。

description.en: A Pokémon that seals happiness in its shell and gives it to people. It is said that it brings good luck.
description.ja: 幸福を殻に閉じ込め、人に贈るポケモン。幸運を呼ぶと言われている。

effect.en: When it yawns, the opponent will yawn too.
effect.ja: あくびをすると相手もあくびをする。

description.en: Its exact appearance is unknown. A scholar who saw what was underneath the rag was overcome with fear and died of shock.
description.ja: 実際の姿は不明。ボロ布の下を見た学者が恐怖に圧倒され、ショック死した。

effect.en: Copy the opponent.
effect.ja: 相手をコピーする。

description.en: They love to drink blood. Once they sink their teeth into their prey, they can instantly take up to 10 ounces or more of blood.
description.ja: 血を飲むのが大好き。一度獲物に歯を立てると、瞬時に10オンス以上の血を吸う。

effect.en: It produces a very annoying noise.
effect.ja: 使用者はひどく迷惑な音を出す。

description.en: This Pokémon knows no fear. It is strong, fast, and cunning. Its daily routine is gnawing at logs.
description.ja: このポケモンは恐れを知らない。強く、速く、狡猾である。丸太をかじるのが日課。

effect.en: To mentally and psychologically torment the opponent until they feel uncomfortable.
effect.ja: 相手が嫌な思いをするまで精神的、心理的に苛める。

description.en: Hates the affection from people it trusts. Twice a year, sets itself on fire to burn off the old fur.
description.ja: 信頼できる相手からの愛情も嫌う。年に2回、自分の体に火をつけ、古い毛皮を焼き払う。

effect.en: This skill is difficult to master. The opponent is beaten not just once, but twice.
effect.ja: 相手を一度だけでなく、二度蹴る。使いこなすのが難しい技。

description.en: Wears the skull of its deceased mother. It's said to evolve when enduring the pain of the mother's death.
description.ja: 亡き母の頭蓋骨を身に着けている。母の死の痛みに耐えたとき、進化するとも言われている。

effect.en: Rush towards the opponent and attack with bones.
effect.ja: 相手に突進し、骨で攻撃する。

description.en: Not only can it take on the appearance and skills of other Pokémon, but you can also mate and breed with other Pokémon. Many trainers use them for breeding purposes.
description.ja: ポケモンの姿や技になりきれるだけでなく、交尾や繁殖も可能。そのため、繁殖のために使うトレーナーも多い。

effect.en: Transform into the opponent.
effect.ja: 相手に変身する。

description.en: Pikachu is by far the most famous Pokémon. Its personality has changed with the games and attention it receives.
description.ja: ピカチュウは、圧倒的に有名なポケモンです。ゲームと注目によってその性格が変わりました

effect.en: Pikachu gives the opponent an electric shock as strong as a toaster.
effect.ja: ピカチュウが相手に与える電気ショックは、トースター並みの強さ

description.en: The light emitted from its ring can be dimmed to become completely invisible in the dark of night.
description.ja: リングから放たれる光を弱めることができるので、夜の暗闇の中では完全に見えなくなることもある。

effect.en: This attack makes the opponent question reality. Forces them to ask deep philosophical questions, like which arm-rest in a movie theater is theirs.
effect.ja: この攻撃は、ターゲットに現実を疑わせます。相手は、映画館でどの肘掛が自分のものなのか、といった哲学的な深い問いかけを考えてしまいます。

description.en: This Pokémon is very loyal to whomever suits it best.
description.ja: このポケモンは、自分に都合の良い相手には非常に忠実である。

effect.en: An experimental move using psychic energy to cause the opponent to have an intense and unpleasant psychedelic experience. Also known as a bad trip.
effect.ja: サイキックエネルギーによる攻撃で、相手に強烈で不快なサイケデリックな体験をさせる。バッドトリップとも呼ばれる。

description.en: The water stream from the shell's rocket launcher has the destructive power to pierce even thick steel plates with a single shot.
description.ja: こうらの ロケットほうから ふきだすすいりゅうは ぶあつい てっぱんもいっぱつで つらぬく はかいりょく。

effect.en: Shoots a powerful jet of water at the opponent. Also effective at cleaning cars and trucks.
effect.ja: 強力な水流を相手に浴びせる。車やトラックの清掃にも有効。

description.en: Able to melt giant rocks with its fire breath.
description.ja: 炎のブレスで巨大な岩を溶かすことができる。

effect.en: A powerful flame that can deal a lot of damage. Can also be used to make s'mores.
effect.ja: 強力な炎を放つ。大ダメージを与えることができるが、スモアの材料にもなる。

description.en: The day after it rains, the scent of flowers on its back intensifies. Pokémon gather there, drawn by the scent.
description.ja: あめの ふった よくじつは せなかの はなの かおりが つよまる。かおりに さそわれ ポケモンが あつまる。

effect.en: Attacks the opponent with energy collected from the sun. Also gives them Vitamin D and may cause a sunburn.
effect.ja: 太陽から集めたエネルギーで相手を攻撃する。ビタミンDを浴びせ、日焼けさせる。

description.en: It can fly faster than any other Pokémon. It can circle the Earth in just 16 hours.
description.ja: 他のどのポケモンよりも速く飛ぶことができる。わずか16時間で地球を一周することができる。

effect.en: The user performs a dance that increases their attack power and speed. The effect lasts for up to 30 minutes, requiring multiple costume changes.
effect.ja: 使用者は攻撃力とスピードが上がる舞をする。最大で30分の効果があり、何度も衣装替えをする必要がある。

name.ja: アローラ パチュー

description.en: This form only occurs in the Alola region. According to researchers, this adaptation is likely due to its diet.
description.ja: この形態に進化するのはアローラ地方だけである。研究者によると、この進化は食事が原因らしい。

effect.en: Uses tarot cards to predict the future. Can also channel your dead grandma ($100).
effect.ja: タロットカードを使って、相手の未来を予言します。また、死んだおばあちゃんとチャネリングすることもできる（100ドル）。

description.en: It absorbs heat from anything around it. If you suddenly feel a chill, it's a sign that Gengar is nearby.
description.ja: 周囲に居るものから熱を吸収する。突然の寒気を感じたら、ゲンガーが近くにいる証拠です。

effect.en: This technique inflicts bad luck on the opponent. This includes various types of misfortune, such as being hit by lightning or being stuck in traffic.
effect.ja: この技は相手に不運を与えます。雷に打たれる、渋滞に巻き込まれるなど、さまざまな運があります。

description.en: A Pokémon created in a laboratory through gene splicing. It has a body suited for battle, but lacks a compassionate heart.
description.ja: 研究所で遺伝子スプライシングによって作られたポケモン。戦闘に適した体つきをしているが、思いやりの心は持ち合わせていない。

effect.en: Attacks the opponent in the future with psychic powers. Pray that it's not when you're on the toilet.
effect.ja: 超能力で未来の相手を攻撃する。トイレの時でないことを祈る。

description.en: This Pokémon has always been rare, and is believed to be the ancestor of all Pokémon.
description.ja: このポケモンは非常に珍しい。全ポケモンの祖先であるとの説が有力である。

effect.en: It can take on the exact same appearance as the opponent and use their techniques. If this technique is used on one of its own kind, it will result in a long night.
effect.ja: 相手と全く同じ姿になり、その技を使うことができる。この技を同人に使うと、長い夜を過ごすことになる。

description.en: It is said to have emerged from an egg in the middle of nowhere and created the world.
description.ja: 何もない所に出現した卵から生まれ、世界を創造したと言われている。

effect.en: Arceus looks at you with judgment. As a god, it knows all your weirdness.
effect.ja: アルセウスは裁きの目であなたを見つめる。神様なので、あなたの全ての変態的な部分を知っている。

name.ja: ぴかぴかする フィッシュウ

description.en: This Pokémon is nearly useless in battle, but it tastes delicious when roasted and seasoned with salt.
description.ja: このポケモンは戦闘にはほとんど役立たないが、塩を付けて焼くと美味しい。

effect.en: In most cases, it does no damage. (Roll a d6 5 times. If the same number appears on all dice rolls, it's an instant KO.)
effect.ja: ほとんどの場合、ダメージを与えない。(サイコロを5回振って、全て同じ目が出たら一撃KO)

name: Mudcreef
description: Its strength is so great that it can destroy mountains with a single blow, and even legends dare not challenge this creature.

attacks.name: Punch
attacks.effect: Throws a punch at the opponent.

name: Meow
description: This creature is cute and fluffy, but highly intelligent and devious! I have a kind heart and like to spend my days sleeping.

attacks.name: Yawn
attacks.effect: I yawn and then I go to sleep. It's a cute trick, but it doesn't work.

attacks.name: Payday
attacks.effect: Attacks to make your opponent drop money.

name: Nidonido
description: This sign is very aggressive and rebellious. It even has a desire to protect its home.

attacks.name: Cut
attacks.effect: Cut whatever is in front of you.

name: Furphy
description: This creature is capable of solving difficult puzzles and has an extremely high IQ.

attacks.name: Stick Slap
attacks.effect: Hitting the opponent with a stick, leaving a lump on the opponent's head.

name: Gegedu
description: This organism is actually just a rock, and has baffled scientists and biologists since its discovery.

attacks.name: Earthquake
attacks.effect: Shakes the ground and attacks the opponent. It can cause great damage to cities.

name: Togouchi
description: This creature can taste sound with its eyes.

attacks.name: Energy Ball
attacks.effect: When it touches other creatures, nothing happens.

name: Blissui
description: This creature loves to protect and heal others. Therefore, it will not be used in combat and will not carry on the fight.

attacks.name: Egg Bomb
attacks.effect: Throws explosive eggs at opponents. Make it green and explode.

name: Slow Mobi
description: This creature uses a sixth sense to see into the future.

attacks.name: Hypnotist
attacks.effect: Uses telekinesis to enter the mind of his victim and tells him to do 50 embarrassing things in front of his friends.

name: Pidgeotto
description: This creature was once abundant on Earth, but now only a handful remain.

attacks.name: Stomp
attacks.effect: Trample and forcefully attack your opponent.

name: Nidanida
description: This creature has magical powers that can be used to contact its body.

attacks.name: Tummy Kick
attacks.effect: Kicks the opponent in the stomach, causing hours of pain.

name: Siechacha
description: This creature loves to fight, and will take on anything while spending its entire life communicating.

attacks.name: Hyper Cut
attacks.effect: Slice the opponent into pieces with a devastating blow.

attacks.name: Bug's Gaze
attacks.effect: Stare at the opponent, causing extreme discomfort.

name: Ghost Boy
description: They are extremely mischievous creatures, and their daily routine is to scare and play pranks on others.

attacks.name: Scare
attacks.effect: Deform its body and face to scare the opponent. This reduces the opponent's attack power.

name: Bonzie
description: Known for burying its lower body in the ground as a defense, and will continue in this state until it's strong enough to defend itself properly.

attacks.name: Kick
attacks.effect: Kick the opponent with the small leg. It's not very effective.

name: Woopa
description: This creature can store water in its stomach and release it when needed.

attacks.name: Water Spray
attacks.effect: Spray water on the opponent, causing confusion and then escaping.

name: Chachi
description: This creature is nocturnal. It has excellent night vision and can fly very silently.

attacks.name: Peck
attacks.effect: Peck the opponent with its sharp beak. Very effective against insect-type creatures.

name: Growly
description: This creature is nocturnal. It has excellent night vision and can fly very silently.

attacks.name: Growl
attacks.effect: Shout abusive language at the other person, making them run away.

attacks.name: Fireball
attacks.effect: Throw a fireball at the opponent.

name: Pantomime Man
description: This creature is believed to have once been human.

attacks.name: Mine
attacks.effect: Create a protective barrier against psychic energy.

name: Jinx
description: The creature disguises itself as a human female, for unknown reasons.

attacks.name: Ice Kiss
attacks.effect: Kiss the opponent, freezing them for 2 turns.

name: Peep
description: This creature can destroy objects with just a gaze and can also create black holes with a thought.

attacks.name: Flipper Smack
attacks.effect: Use its flippers to hit the opponent hard. It deals a lot of damage and is also a very cute move.

name: Tight
description: The shells are as hard as iron and highly poisonous, so they cannot be eaten.

attacks.name: Close
attacks.effect: Close its shell, becoming invincible to most physical attacks.

name: Snow Boy
description: This creature is so rare that in the past it was thought to be a mythical entity.

attacks.name: Hail
attacks.effect: Summon a song from the clouds, dealing base damage to the opponent each turn.

name: Ratatou
description: This creature can survive in almost any environment, especially where cheese is plentiful.

attacks.name: Tackle
attacks.effect: Charge the opponent at full speed, dealing damage.

name: Ratacape
description: This creature's teeth never stop growing.

attacks.name: Superbite
attacks.effect: Bite the opponent in an extremely powerful manner.

attacks.name: Tail Whip
attacks.effect: Strike opponent with its tail.

name: Sanchi
description: This creature lives in the desert and creates its songs underground.

attacks.name: Sand Ball
attacks.effect: Throw sand balls at the opponent, lowering their accuracy.

name: Catapy
description: Although this creature is small and weak, it is a Lion.

attacks.name: String Shot
attacks.effect: Shoot strings around the opponent, greatly slowing them down.

name: Sticky
description: The creature's brain is located within the West.

attacks.name: Lick
attacks.effect: Lick the other person.

attacks.name: Sit
attacks.effect: Sit on top of the other person.

name: Pachisui
description: This creature has enough electrical energy to fully charge a smartphone.

attacks.name: Thundercheeks
attacks.effect: Shock the opponent with your adorable little cheeks.

name: Onyx
description: The creature's body appears to be made of rock, but it is just a calcified exoskeleton.

attacks.name: Rock Tail
attacks.effect: Slam the opponent with Rock Tail.

attacks.name: Headbutt
attacks.effect: Headbutt the opponent.

name: Kakuma
description: This creature is in the process of evolving and is unable to fight. It hides until ready to transform.

attacks.name: Harden
attacks.effect: Harden itself to protect from damage.

name: Pony Pony
description: Depending on whether the creature likes you or not, the fire can either hurt or heal you.

attacks.name: Fire Wheel
attacks.effect: Create a ring of fire to attack, which can cause burns to the opponent.

name: Pink Boy
description: This organism is believed to be of extraterrestrial origin and its genes are completely different from any other organism on Earth.

attacks.name: Random Move
attacks.effect: Connect with a higher dimensional being and learn random moves.

name: Magic Mike
description: This creature has a very powerful kick, but an incredibly weak punch.

attacks.name: Leg Kick
attacks.effect: Kick the opponent's leg to significantly reduce their evasion and speed.

name: Steve
description: The creature appears to be wearing boxing shorts and gloves, but these are actual body parts.

attacks.name: Straight Jab
attacks.effect: Use the lead hand to punch the opponent in the face. All subsequent attacks will be critical hits.

name: Magnemi
description: It is not yet clear whether this is one organism or three.

attacks.name: Thunder Shock
attacks.effect: Shock the opponent with an electric shock, which can paralyze them.

name: Watobatto
description: This creature's shell is as hard as steel.

attacks.name: Wet Slap
attacks.effect: Spit into its hand and start slapping the opponent. This is not only physically damaging, but is also very rude.

name: Ivysor
description: This creature has a large flower on its back that converts sunlight into energy, so it barely needs to eat.

attacks.name: Sweet Scent
attacks.effect: Cover itself in expensive body spray, attracting all kinds of creatures.

name: Charmi
description: This creature is very unusual and almost always rebellious.

attacks.name: Fire Breath
attacks.effect: Blow fire into the opponent's face after eating an onion.

attacks.name: Scratch
attacks.effect: Scratch the opponent.

name: Champuru
description: This creature is known to take part in many recreational activities and has been spotted surfing on numerous occasions.

attacks.name: Fly
attacks.effect: Use balloons from a recent birthday party to levitate off the ground.

name: Snopi
description: This organism is extremely rare and can only be found in active volcanoes.

attacks.name: Burn
attacks.effect: Use fire to destroy everything in its path.

name: Lil Guy
description: This organism can convert sunlight into food and, if stationary, can survive for years on sunlight and rain alone.

attacks.name: Flower Delight
attacks.effect: Create a scent that evokes someone's most cherished memories.

name: Champto
description: The shell of this creature is as hard as iron.

attacks.name: Bubbles
attacks.effect: Make cute animal shaped bubbles. This is very popular at birthday parties.

name: Nanutayo
description: These creatures are very rare and are said to only appear to those with good karma.

attacks.name: Seance
attacks.effect: Communicate with spirits from the afterlife using psychic abilities.

name: Rai Rai
description: This creature enjoys taking selfies.

attacks.name: Electric Shock
attacks.effect: Shock the opponent with an electric shock. This can also be used to charge mobile phones and tablets.

name: Floreomon
description: This creature's daily routine is to find a sunny spot on the floor and spend the whole day sleeping.

attacks.name: Bread Loaf
attacks.effect: All limbs retract into the body to take the shape of a loaf of bread.

name: Johnnymon
description: This creature can summon thunderstorms when provoked or threatened.

attacks.name: Revive
attacks.effect: Use an electric shock to revive a stunned teammate.

name: Vepenomnom
description: These creatures love frozen desserts like ice cream and shaved ice.

attacks.name: Aquafresh
attacks.effect: Produce a mist from its eye socket that kills 99.9% of germs and bacteria, leaving a refreshing scent behind.

name: Entomi
description: It is said that this creature was reborn from something that died long ago in the burning tower.

attacks.name: Unknown
attacks.effect: Summon an army of small creatures for help.

name: Raikomo
description: It is said that this creature was reborn from something that died long ago in the burning tower.

attacks.name: Lightning Rain
attacks.effect: Call down a thunderstorm, striking everything in the area with lightning.

name: Sukumo
description: It is said that this creature was reborn from something that died long ago in the burning tower.

attacks.name: Crystal Beam
attacks.effect: Decorate your room with beautiful stones and crystals.

name: Shiny Ramune
description: This creature can make his emotions felt by those around him.

attacks.name: Mind Read
attacks.effect: Use psychic ability to read the opponent's mind. This technique is also effective in poker.
